text: @marcorubio @realDonaldTrump Professor Ferguson was not known reliability. his 2001 disease model was criticized as “not fit for purpose” after it predicted that up to 150,000 people could die in U.K. from mad cow (177 did). U.K. coronavirus deaths prediction is now down to 20,000 people, 4% of  original.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
